title: Looking for a serious active team
body:
Age: 21

IGN: whitepumah

Mic: Yes

Experience: 3000+ ranked games over 3 years

Rank: silver 4

What I am after:
I am looking for an active team who are willing to put in a lot of effort into being able to play as a team consistently with the goal of becoming a strong team who can climb.

replies.body: what proof do you have that you were beating plats in ranked 5s?
The same proof that diamond players have that prove they didn't buy the account.

> [{quoted}](name=whitePumah,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=l7cIPtEd,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-04-21T08:52:58.608+0000)
>
> The same proof that diamond players have that prove they didn't buy the account.

so you are saying a bronze/silver/gold player could get really fed in a diamond game? and why the hell would a diamond player buy a diamond account? if you are winning lots of your games and getting solid averages it's a clear indicator that they didn't buy their account. 

so were is your proof then?

I am saying how do you know they did not just buy the account. The match history will be of the account. A bronze could buy it and then look to trial for diamond team and you would not know until they were given a trial.

My point is that I can't prove it unless you give me the chance to.

In starcraft a silver player would stand almost no chance vs a platinum unless they were a smurf.

every other one YOU joined. 
3000+ ranked still only silver 4. runs dictatorships. 
YOU are the reason teams disband and none now want you. good day

3000+ ranked games and ONLY silver 4?

this that same guy that tried to make a team and run it as a dictatorship lol
We were beating platinum in ranked 5's!
A platinum team with no experience in 5's and plays like it's solo queue isn't too hard :P
nobody wanted to be apart of your horrid scheme then and I doubt anyone will now
I am not creating one I am looking to join one that wont fall apart after a few days like every other one i have joined.
